content: quick cowl pattern for sock sets or scrappy leftovers pattern suitable for any fingering/sock or dk weight yarn gauge is not crucial for this pattern so enjoy the fun textures and the easy color changes yarn mc 36-40g fingering weight yarn seen in sewroyal october yarn club cc 1 10-12g lime cc 2 10-12g purple i needed 12g of each contrast but my testers were able to do it in a single 20g mini skein of fingering weight yarn
